Package com.example.projectv2.Controller

Class ProfileImageController

java.lang.Object
com.example.projectv2.Controller.ProfileImageController
public class ProfileImageController extends Object
Controller class for handling profile image operations in Firebase Storage.

      public void openGallery(android.app.Activity activity, int requestCode)
      Opens the gallery to select an image.
      Parameters:
      activity - the activity in which the gallery is opened
      requestCode - the request code for the gallery activity

    • uploadImageToFirebase

      public void uploadImageToFirebase(android.net.Uri imageUri, String userID, ProfileImageController.ImageUploadCallback callback)
      Uploads an image to Firebase Storage with a filename based on the user ID.
      Parameters:
      imageUri - the URI of the image to be uploaded
      userID - the user ID to use in the filename
      callback - callback for success or failure

    • loadImage

      public void loadImage(String userID, android.widget.ImageView imageView)
      Loads an image from Firebase Storage based on the user ID and sets it in the specified ImageView.
      Parameters:
      userID - the user ID to use in the filename
      imageView - the ImageView in which to set the image

    • removeImage

      public void removeImage(String userID, android.widget.ImageView imageView)
      Removes an image from Firebase Storage based on the user ID.
      Parameters:
      userID - the user ID to use in the filename
      imageView - the ImageView in which to set the default image

    • loadImageUsingBitmap

      public void loadImageUsingBitmap(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap, android.widget.ImageView imageView)
      Loads an image into an ImageView using a Bitmap.
      Parameters:
      bitmap - the Bitmap to load
      imageView - the ImageView in which to load the Bitmap
